title: Promo - One Minute Irish
description: Welcome to One Minute Irish. in this podcast you'll be learning just enough Irish to get by on a holiday or business trip to Ireland, or just to impress your Irish-speaking friends. Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
